name: Guru Laghima's Teachings
description: New growth cannot exist without first the destruction of the old.

name: Hurricane Winds
description: What the airbenders had lacked in skill and power they made up for in numbers.

name: Kyoshi's Triumph
description: A powerful gust of wind washes over the surprised Chin and strips him of all his clothes except for his underwear.

name: Tornado
description: An Avatar-level airbender can create massive tornadoes and hurricanes at will.

name: Creeping Crystal
description: Jennamiten-also known as creeping crystal- grows at remarkably fast speeds when it comes into contact with organic matter.

name: Earth Shackles
description: With proper timing an earthbender can bind an opponent's arms with triangle-shaped slabs.

name: Rock Bullet
description: A master earthbender can launch shrapnel-like fragments of earth with great speed.

name: Rockslide
description: An earthbender can cause many rocks of a multitude of sizes to rain down on their opponent.

name: Agni Kai
description: A fight for one's honor and is won only when one opponent burns the other.

name: Dragon Fire
description: Their fire was beautiful. I saw so many colors. Colors I've never imagined.

name: Fire Breath
description: Iroh was the last outsider to face the masters. They deemed him worthy and passed the secret onto him as well.

name: Raze
description: From our airships we will rain fire over their lands. A fire that will destroy everything; and from the ashes a new world will be born.

name: Dessication
description: They're called fire lilies. They only bloom a few weeks a year. And like all plants and all living things they're filled with water.

name: Ocean's Wrath
description: It its wrath the Ocean Spirit La laid waste to the Fire Nation's armies.

name: Sever Bending
description: When he took my bending the sensation was somehow familiar. I later recognized it as my brother's bloodbending grip.

name: Whirlpool
description: The Great Serpent is trapped in the maelstrom.

name: Avatar Beam
description: The avatar can shoot laser beams apparently.

name: Eternal Struggle
description: For ten-thousand years Raava and Vaatu fought for dominance.

name: Remove Bending
description: With his bending taken away Phoenix Lord Ozai was no longer a threat to the world.

name: Steal Face
description: Koh can steal any face that shows even the slightest sign of emotion in his presence.
